actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that the surviving spouse of an insured worker may authorize direct payment of the worker's lump-sum death payment to the funeral home for his burial expenses.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides that the surviving spouse of an insured worker may authorize direct payment of the worker's lump-sum death payment received pursuant to participation in the Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance program of the Social Security Act to the funeral home for his funeral expenses.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that the surviving spouse of an insured worker may authorize direct payment of the worker's lump-sum death payment to the funeral home for his burial expenses.
